thread.title: Paul Hollywood posts an amazing picture of himself in full-on skater mode - Fun
thread.title_full: Paul Hollywood posts an amazing picture of himself in full-on skater mode - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Sam Warner
title: Paul Hollywood posts an amazing picture of himself in full-on skater mode - Fun
text: Have you ever imagined Paul Hollywood wearing a hoodie and clutching a skateboard? Neither have we, but the thought has come true and we're all the better for it.The Great British Bake Off judge posted the amazing picture of himself on Twitter earlier this evening.Thanks @RevSkatepark I haven't skate boarded in decades ...! pic.twitter.com/4deYPIQG4D— Paul Hollywood (@PaulHollywood) October 3, 2015 Hollywood wrote in the tweet: "Thanks @RevSkatepark I haven't skate boarded in decades ...!"Has the star got a secret past in skateboarding that we never knew about? In any case, he's certainly gone up in the cool stakes.We're obviously waiting for Mary Berry to reveal her previous life as a BMX bandit now. © BBC / Love Productions/Mark BourdillonThe Great British Bake Off 2015 Meanwhile, the final episode of The Great British Bake Off is set to air next week, with finalists Tamal Ray, Nadiya Hussain and Ian Cumming competing for the title.Berry revealed that the final is "extremely close"."Usually there is a bit of a disaster but this time it is very exciting, because as a viewer you won't know. You will be surprised," she said.The Great British Bake Off final airs on Wednesday (October 7) at 8pm on BBC One.
